items.title: Microsoft, AMD Partner to Co-Engineer Custom Silicon for Next-Gen Xbox Consoles
items.description: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the best QQQ stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On June 18, Microsoft and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) announced a multi-year agreement to co-engineer custom silicon for a range of devices, such as Microsoft’s next-generation Xbox consoles. The partnership aims to enhance visual quality, immersive gameplay, and […]
